item.title: There are more than one pothole between Old Bath Road and London Road traffic lights, 17th February
item.description:
I have to swerve to avoid them as I don't want another puncture. Sometimes that means going on to the oncoming carriage way if there is a bicycle on the road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Old Bath Road, Fairview, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
